snippet.title: Spirit of the Island Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Spirit of the Island 1.0 is now available on all three major platforms: Steam, Epic Games Store and GOG!

Get the game today:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592110/Spirit_of_the_Island/
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/spirit-of-the-island
GOG: http://spirit_of_the_island

Follow Spirit of the Island:
Discord: https://discord.gg/DcqSSBFnGT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/sotithegame
